name: bash_complex
description: Complex Bash script with modular functions, configuration management, and advanced features
content:
#!/usr/bin/env bash
#
# {{description}}
# Generated by ScripGen
# {{alsaniaSignature}}
#

set -euo pipefail

# =============================================================================
# CONFIGURATION SECTION
# =============================================================================

# Script metadata
readonly SCRIPT_NAME="$(basename "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}")"
readonly SCRIPT_DIR="$(cd "$(dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}")" && pwd)"
readonly SCRIPT_VERSION="1.0.0"

# Default configuration
readonly DEFAULT_CONFIG_FILE="${HOME}/.config/${SCRIPT_NAME%.sh}/config.conf"
readonly DEFAULT_LOG_LEVEL="INFO"
readonly DEFAULT_DRY_RUN=false

# Configuration variables (can be overridden)
CONFIG_FILE="${CONFIG_FILE:-$DEFAULT_CONFIG_FILE}"
LOG_LEVEL="${LOG_LEVEL:-$DEFAULT_LOG_LEVEL}"
DRY_RUN="${DRY_RUN:-$DEFAULT_DRY_RUN}"

# Color codes
readonly RED='\033[0;31m'
readonly GREEN='\033[0;32m'
readonly YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
readonly BLUE='\033[0;34m'
readonly NC='\033[0m'

# =============================================================================
# UTILITY FUNCTIONS
# =============================================================================

# Logging functions
log_debug() { [[ "$LOG_LEVEL" == "DEBUG" ]] && echo -e "${BLUE}[DEBUG]${NC} $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S') - $*"; }
log_info() { [[ "$LOG_LEVEL" =~ ^(INFO|DEBUG)$ ]] && echo -e "${GREEN}[INFO]${NC} $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S') - $*"; }
log_warn() { echo -e "${YELLOW}[WARN]${NC} $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S') - $*" >&2; }
log_error() { echo -e "${RED}[ERROR]${NC} $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S') - $*" >&2; }

# Validation functions
validate_command() {
    local cmd="$1"
    if ! command -v "$cmd" >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        log_error "Required command not found: $cmd"
        return 1
    fi
}

validate_file() {
    local file="$1"
    local readable_only="${2:-false}"
    if [[ ! -f "$file" ]]; then
        log_error "File not found: $file"
        return 1
    fi
    if [[ "$readable_only" == "true" ]] && [[ ! -r "$file" ]]; then
        log_error "File not readable: $file"
        return 1
    fi
}

validate_directory() {
    local dir="$1"
    local writable="${2:-false}"
    if [[ ! -d "$dir" ]]; then
        log_error "Directory not found: $dir"
        return 1
    fi
    if [[ "$writable" == "true" ]] && [[ ! -w "$dir" ]]; then
        log_error "Directory not writable: $dir"
        return 1
    fi
}

# Configuration management
load_config() {
    if [[ -f "$CONFIG_FILE" ]]; then
        log_debug "Loading configuration from: $CONFIG_FILE"
        # shellcheck source=/dev/null
        source "$CONFIG_FILE"
    else
        log_debug "No configuration file found, using defaults"
    fi
}

save_config() {
    local config_dir
    config_dir="$(dirname "$CONFIG_FILE")"
    
    if [[ "$DRY_RUN" == "true" ]]; then
        log_info "DRY RUN: Would create config directory: $config_dir"
        return 0
    fi
    
    mkdir -p "$config_dir"
    
    cat > "$CONFIG_FILE" << EOF
# ${SCRIPT_NAME} configuration
# Generated on $(date)

LOG_LEVEL="$LOG_LEVEL"
DRY_RUN="$DRY_RUN"
EOF
}

# =============================================================================
# CORE FUNCTIONS
# =============================================================================

{{coreFunctions}}

# =============================================================================
# MAIN LOGIC
# =============================================================================

main() {
    log_info "Starting ${SCRIPT_NAME} v${SCRIPT_VERSION}..."
    
    # Load configuration
    load_config
    
    # Validate dependencies
    local deps=({{dependencies}})
    for dep in "${deps[@]}"; do
        validate_command "$dep" || exit 1
    done
    
    # Parse command line arguments
    parse_arguments "$@"
    
    # Execute main logic
    {{mainLogic}}
    
    # Save configuration if modified
    save_config
    
    log_info "${SCRIPT_NAME} completed successfully"
}

# Argument parsing
parse_arguments() {
    while [[ $# -gt 0 ]]; do
        case $1 in
            -h|--help)
                show_help
                exit 0
                ;;
            -v|--verbose)
                LOG_LEVEL="DEBUG"
                shift
                ;;
            -c|--config)
                CONFIG_FILE="$2"
                shift 2
                ;;
            --dry-run)
                DRY_RUN=true
                shift
                ;;
            --version)
                echo "${SCRIPT_NAME} v${SCRIPT_VERSION}"
                exit 0
                ;;
            *)
                log_error "Unknown option: $1"
                show_help
                exit 1
                ;;
        esac
    done
}

# Help function
show_help() {
    cat << EOF
${SCRIPT_NAME} v${SCRIPT_VERSION}

{{description}}

USAGE:
    $SCRIPT_NAME [OPTIONS]

OPTIONS:
    -h, --help           Show this help message
    -v, --verbose        Enable verbose output
    -c, --config FILE    Specify configuration file
    --dry-run           Show what would be done without executing
    --version           Show version information

CONFIGURATION:
    Configuration file: ${CONFIG_FILE}
    Log level: ${LOG_LEVEL}
    Dry run: ${DRY_RUN}

Alsania Protocol v1.0 - Built by Sigma, Powered by Echo
EOF
}

# =============================================================================
# EXECUTION
# =============================================================================

# Set trap for cleanup
trap 'log_error "Script interrupted"' INT TERM

# Run main function
main "$@"
